you need to disable the terminal bell. In gnome-terminal, go to Edit, then Profiles -- click on Default, click Edit and then uncheck Terminal bell in the first screen, then click Close.
to install the jre, sudo apt-get install sun-java5-jre
don't manually download. Use apt to install it.
to install the jdk, sudo apt-get install sun-java5-jdk, then sudo update-alternatives --config java
